The New Zenith Bank Mobile App
... where class meets convenience.

The app was redesigned with you in mind to give you seamless banking experience.

1.	Personal Finance Management (Track your spending patterns and set specific savings goals).
2.	Products & Services. (Open additional accounts, get bank statements and process Dubai visas).
3.	Card Management. (View your card history and manage your cards).
4.	Lifestyle (View and book flight hotels and transportation).
5.	Forex Currency Exchange Rate and Conversion Calculator.
6.	Profile Data Page Management.
7.	Merchant QR payment,
8.	Make local and International transfers, pay bills and so much more.
